title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Science Domain English Communication via Mobile-Assisted Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in advanced scientific terminology and basic smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Achieve over 80% proficiency in constructing English sentences in mobile environments using scientific terminology
Maintain over 90% completion rate for collaborative writing tasks using Web 2.0 tools like Padlet and Google Jamboard

Within one week, learners create self-directed study plans (10 hours/week) using ≥3 digital resources (TED-Ed, Quizlet) on mobile devices, and write reports meeting ≥80% compliance in ≥2 of 3 rubric items (goal clarity, resource appropriateness, time allocation rationality)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
